pages.text: $(l:tools/drone)無人機/$將會使用其攜帶的物品合成物品。要指定合成表，在右側以合成表的形式放置$(l:programming/item_filter)物品過濾器/$。$(p)不需要連接正好 9 個$(thing)物品過濾器/$；只要合成表被構建出來就可行。

By default the Crafting widget will try to craft as many items as possible; you can limit this in the widget GUI with the $(thing)Use Count/$ setting.$(p)You will probably want to install some $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#dispenser)Inventory Upgrades/$ in the $(item)Drone/$ to give it a larger inventory.
